name: Test Report
query:
SELECT 
    cgm.name AS "ID",
    cgm.creche_id AS "Creche ID",
    cgm.measurement_date AS "Measurement Date",
    cgm.owner AS "Data Entered By",
    ad.name AS "ID (Anthropromatic Details)",
    ad.cgmguid AS "CGMGUID (Anthropromatic Details)",
    cgm.cgmguid AS "CGMGUID"
FROM `tabChild Growth Monitoring` AS cgm
INNER JOIN `tabAnthropromatic Data` AS ad 
    ON ad.parent = cgm.name 
WHERE cgm.name IN (
    '17186', '17189', '17214', '17238', '17263', '17288', '17239', '17264', '17289',
    '17213', '17237', '17262', '17287', '17204', '17223', '17248', '17273', '17227',
    '17252', '17277', '17199', '17218', '17243', '17268', '17197', '17212', '17236',
    '17261', '17286', '17196', '17211', '17234', '17259', '17284', '17235', '17260',
    '17285', '17215', '17240', '17265', '17290', '17193', '17205', '17224', '17249',
    '17274', '17183', '17191', '17201', '17220', '17245', '17270', '17226', '17251',
    '17276', '17216', '17241', '17266', '17190', '17198', '17217', '17242', '17267',
    '17185', '17188', '17195', '17209', '17231', '17256', '17281', '17210', '17232',
    '17257', '17282', '17233', '17258', '17283', '17207', '17228', '17253', '17278',
    '17229', '17254', '17279', '17184', '17187', '17194', '17206', '17225', '17250',
    '17275', '17203', '17222', '17247', '17272', '17200', '17219', '17244', '17269',
    '17192', '17202', '17221', '17246', '16758', '17058', '16757', '16807', '16749',
    '16799', '16849', '16899', '16751', '16801', '16851', '16901', '17051', '16755',
    '16805', '17055', '16750', '16800', '16850', '16900', '16740', '16790', '16721',
    '16771', '16821', '16871'
);
